Docs.summary: Return BotData with Data pointing to a JObject or an empty BotData() record with ETag:""
Docs.returns: Bot record that is stored for this key, or "empty" bot record ready to be stored

Docs.param: The data that should be saved.
Docs.summary: Save a BotData using the ETag. Etag consistency checks If ETag is null or empty, this will set the value if nobody has set it yet If ETag is "*" then this will unconditionally set the value If ETag matches then this will update the value if it is unchanged. If Data is null this removes record, otherwise it stores
